name: Keto Diet
description: A low-carb, high-fat diet to help with weight loss.
benefits: Weight loss, Improved energy levels, Enhanced mental focus

name: Mediterranean Diet
description: A heart-healthy diet inspired by the traditional eating habits of countries bordering the Mediterranean Sea.
benefits: Reduced risk of heart disease, Promotes weight loss, Improves brain function

name: Vegan Diet
description: A plant-based diet that excludes all animal products.
benefits: Lower cholesterol, Reduced risk of chronic diseases, Ethical treatment of animals
